column4: Google to face grilling by UK lawmakers over tax deal

column4: Judge fine-tunes cable warranty case against Monster  Best Buy

column4: Boeing sets first flight of 737 MAX for Friday

column4: Boeing completes first refueling flight of KC-46A tanker
column5: WASHINGTON Boeing Co and air crews from the U.S. Air Force completed the first refueling flight of the KC-46A Pegasus aerial tanker on Sunday  transferring 1 600 pounds (725.75 kg) of fuel to an F-16 fighter jet flying at 20 000 feet (6096 m)  Boeing said.

column4: South Korean court orders jail term for Deutsche trader for market manipulation

column4: S.Korean court orders jail term for Deutsche unit exec for market manipulation

column5: Oil and gas explorer Ophir Energy Plc  said it signed a non-binding heads of terms agreement with Schlumberger Ltd  by which the latter would receive an interest in its Fortuna project in Equatorial Guinea.

column5: Twitter Inc  shares closed down almost 5 percent on Monday as a management exodus sparked investor concerns over unsettled leadership and stalled growth at the online social media company.
